channel.title: Commands don't work as Admin/Moderator
channel.description:
Hi again everyone,
I decided to stick with the 3.2 version for my server, however this problem is persisting.
I am able to change my character rights, however when I do I cannot use any of the commands in game. When i speak in game it will show moderator status, but when i type ANY commands such as ::bank or ::pickup nothing happens.
Please someone help!

item.title: Commands don't work as Admin/Moderator
item.dc:creator: @runescape120 runescape120
item.description:
@runescape120 wrote:

liamp:

does the commands work if your player rights =0 or any if they = 1,2 or is it just when you change it to a staff rights that the command stops working ?

It stops working when i change the rights.

The commands work when it’s set to character-rights= 3

It’s Aryan 3.2 version by the way.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands don't work as Admin/Moderator
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“runescape120, post:1, topic:543845”]Hi again everyone,

I decided to stick with the 3.2 version for my server, however this problem is persisting.

I am able to change my character rights, however when I do I cannot use any of the commands in game. When i speak in game it will show moderator status, but when i type ANY commands such as ::bank or ::pickup nothing happens.

Please someone help![/quote]

What revision? I know a lot of recent servers have a system like this:

if(playerRights == 0) {
// playerCommands
} else if (playerRights == 1) {
// moderatorCommands
}

Read full topic
